actions.text: Amendment SA 3724 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 3724 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 3748. To require that additional factors be included in the design of counseling pathways under the Transition Assistance Program of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3724 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3724 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 3748.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require that additional factors be included in the design of counseling pathways under the Transition Assistance Program of the Department of Defense.
